actions.committee: House Committee on Banking, Currency and Housing
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Banking, Currency and Housing.
Committee on Banking, Currency, and Housing discharged in House.
Measure laid on table in House, S. 371 passed in lieu.

official_title: A bill to provide for the striking of medals commemorating the contributions by individuals of various ethnic backgrounds who contributed to the founding of the United States of America.

summary.text: (Measure laid on table in House, S. 371 passed in lieu) Provides for the striking of, and furnishing to the American Revolution Bicentennial Administration, not more than 25,000 medals commemorating the contributions of persons of various ethnic backgrounds to the founding of the United States.

titles.title: A bill to provide for the striking of medals commemorating the contributions by individuals of various ethnic backgrounds who contributed to the founding of the United States of America.
